definition[0]: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes
example[0]: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
example[1]: The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
explanation[0]: Elapse is not used in the progressive You say
example[2]: We hardly notice how much time elapses
bad_example[0]: We hardly notice how much time is elapsing
